# Cached Documentation Catalog

> Local cache of external service documentation. Check here before using WebSearch/WebFetch.

| Name | Category | URL | Cached |
|------|----------|-----|--------|
| redis | tools | https://redis.io/docs/ | 2026-02-07 |
| aiohttp | tools | https://docs.aiohttp.org/ | 2026-02-07 |
| typer | tools | https://typer.tiangolo.com/ | 2026-02-07 |
| n8n | tools | https://docs.n8n.io/ | 2026-02-07 |
| home-assistant | tools | https://www.home-assistant.io/docs/ | 2026-02-07 |
| pandas | tools | https://pandas.pydata.org/docs/ | 2026-02-07 |
| convex | tools | https://docs.convex.dev/ | 2026-02-07 |
| supabase | tools | https://supabase.com/docs | 2026-02-07 |
| vercel | tools | https://vercel.com/docs | 2026-02-07 |
| traefik | tools | https://doc.traefik.io/traefik/ | 2026-02-07 |
| fastapi | python | https://fastapi.tiangolo.com/ | 2026-02-07 |
| httpx | python | https://www.python-httpx.org/ | 2026-02-07 |
| poetry | python | https://python-poetry.org/docs | 2026-02-07 |
| docker | services | https://docs.docker.com/ | 2026-02-07 |
| tailscale | services | https://tailscale.com/kb/ | 2026-02-08 |
| cloudflare | services | https://developers.cloudflare.com/ | 2026-02-08 |
| polymarket | services | https://docs.polymarket.com/ | 2026-02-08 |
| nextjs | javascript | https://nextjs.org/docs | 2026-02-07 |

## Usage

Before fetching external docs:

1. Check this index: Is the service cached?
2. If yes: Read from `docs/cache/{category}/{name}/README.md`
3. If no: Fetch with webReader MCP and add to cache

## Adding New Docs

```bash
# Use webReader MCP to fetch
mcp__web_reader__webReader url="https://docs.service.com"

# Save to appropriate category
mkdir -p docs/cache/{category}/{name}
# Save content to README.md

# Update this index
```

## Staleness

Cache entries from 2026-02-07. Consider refreshing after 30 days.
